attributes.action: Reintroduce the ten pence band on non saving income
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Mr Brown has publically announced that he has made a mistake on removing the 10p band, we the undersigned demand its immediate reintroduction to prevent millions of hardworking people suffering further financial hardship.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
